prompt: make me a website to track workout plans and calories
refinedPrompt: Create a responsive fitness website that allows users to log in, create personalized workout plans, and track their daily calorie intake and macronutrients. The website should include a dashboard displaying progress, a library of exercises with instructions and videos, and integration with popular fitness wearables and apps. Additionally, provide a feature to set fitness goals, track weight changes, and generate reports to monitor progress over time.
